sections.heading: agency; handle claims; Attorney General; supervision
sections.text: The Risk Manager may delegate to a state agency the handling of workers' compensation claims of employees of that agency, under the supervision and direction of the Attorney General.SourceLaws 1971, LB 390, § 5;Laws 1986, LB 811, § 125;Laws 2000,

48-196.State agency; handle claims; Attorney General; supervision.

The Risk Manager may delegate to a state agency the handling of workers' compensation claims of employees of that agency, under the supervision and direction of the Attorney General.

SourceLaws 1971, LB 390, § 5;Laws 1986, LB 811, § 125;Laws 2000, LB 1221, § 16;Laws 2019, LB418, § 5.
